metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2350 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
pam_shield before 0.9.4: Default configuration does not perform protective action

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-shield - 0.9.2-3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pam-shield package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.2-3.3').
